Name: Open multimodal iEEG-fMRI dataset from naturalistic stimulation with a short audiovisual film
Acknowledgements: We thank Frans Leijten, Cyrille Ferrier, Geert-Jan Huiskamp, Sandra van der Salm and Tineke Gebbink for help with collecting data; Peter Gosselaar and Peter van Rijen for implanting the electrodes; the technicians and staff of the clinical neurophysiology department and the patients for their time and effort; and the members of the UMC Utrecht ECoG research team for data collection. We also thank the Swedish Film Institute film company for their help and the provided materials.
Funding: the Netherlands Organisation for Scientific Research (Language in Interaction Project Gravitation Grant 024.001.006)
EthicsApprovals: The study was approved by the Medical Ethical Committee of the Utrecht University Medical Center in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki (2013)
